messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Feingold
messages.msgSnippet: Feingold was a Kaiser SF doc who found the relationship between what were then called hyperactive or hyperkenetic kids and their diet.  He tested his
messages.messageBody:
Feingold was a Kaiser SF doc who found the relationship between what were
then called "hyperactive" or "hyperkenetic" kids and their diet. He tested
his theory on hundreds, if not thousands of kids. And, from personal
experience, I can say that there is a definate relationship between what
children eat and how they react/respond to any given stimulous.

Here's the link: http://www.feingold.org/home.html

Lynda
